name: HQ
description: The First AI Enhanced Questing and Rewards Protocol Metaverse HQ (MVHQ) is an AI enhanced Questing protocol for Gaming, De-Fi, Protocols, Creators, NFT/Memecoin communities, and Decentralized Ecosystems. MVHQ has distributed millions of dollars in value to users as it becomes the universal nexus for on and off-chain rewards. MVHQ was founded in 2021 as the first NFT gated community of Crypto/NFT whales, power users, investors, and founders. After $3bn+ in NFT trading volume, 500+ partnerships, and facilitating $30m in NFT and crypto rewards, MVHQ set off to build a questing and rewards protocol that incentivizes sustainable and long term user engagement. Today, Metaverse HQ has distributed millions of dollars in value to users as it becomes the universal nexus for on and off-chain rewards and is uniquely positioned to become the leading foray to the world of web3 for the consumer masses.
